participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: curious and imaginative, but often feels isolated.
participant_1.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and introspective, with a passion for history.
participant_2.background: i've a big library at home. i am partly deaf. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

content.text: thanks you for a cup of tea cause i am partly deaf
and it's great for being a museum tour guide because I am
fancy tea tastes the best at museum and i like to drink it
but i've a big library at home so get out of my home
do you have a time to listen to me whine about nothing and everything at the once?
